DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective trial determine whether two dos extract bran demonstrate prebiotic effect colonic bacteria ( modulate select fecal microbial population , particularly bifidobacteria ) . The secondary objective measure potential beneficial effect consume extract bran follow physiological parameter : laxation , fecal pH , fecal moisture stool consistency , blood glucose insulin concentration , plasma lipid profile serum free fatty acid , colonic bacterial short chain fatty acid production , ammonia metabolism protein degradation , biomarkers oxidative stress inflammation .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Digestive Physiological Effects Extract From Bran Healthy Men Women
DOC.criteria: Male female 1875 year age Body mass index ≥18.5 < 35.0 kg/m2 Fasting LDLC level ≥100 mg/dL < 200 mg/dL Otherwise judge good health , willing maintain habitual food beverage intake physical activity pattern throughout trial Significant gastrointestinal condition Use pre/probiotic food supplement Use antibiotic Pregnancy Certain muscle , liver , kidney , lung gastrointestinal condition medication Poorly control hypertension Cancer treat within prior 2 year
